title: Angry Pickles
description: A minimal ecommerce application to create a storefront with Gatsby, Stripe, & Netlify Functions. The site is statically generated based on Stripe inventory and dynamically updates with live inventory & availability data. The checkout is powered by Stripe integration with serverless functions to interact with the Stripe API. The shopping cart persists in local storage and responsive images provided with gatsby-image.

title: Create, Read, Update, and Delete Tutorial Application
description: Created an application to demonstrate a "how-to" using Gatsby and React, utilizing Google Firestore NoSQL database for data storage.
